author: dP-watchfaces

changelog.release_notes:
1.4
- Bug fixed: ignored icons selected when CUSTOM COLORS theme selected.

1.3
+ Bug fixed: issue with last Pebble firmware 4.3 (only Pebble Time model was affected)

1.2
+ Bug fixed: on CUSTOM COLORS theme and weather icons style AUTO SELECTION, wrong icons selected.

1.1 
+ Ready for Pebble Time 2 
+ More custom colors

description:
Straight Plus

All the options included in Straight watchface plus:
+ HEALTH in details style (step count, distance walked, Kcalories burned, or Heart rate)
+ FITNESS style (big heart rate and step count)
+ STEP GOAL progress bar
+ USER COLORS theme (customize all colors)
+ Hourly vibration option
+ New Date style option

14 lookStyles x 4 fonts x 6 dateStyles x (44 themes + 26^9 user colors) x 2 batteryBar x 2 stepGoalBar x 2 swapColors x 9 iconStyles = 131,350,553,002,852,000 OMG different Straight Plus skins!

(Time, Weather, Health, Heart)
*Heart rate available only for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.

Designed and developed by dPunisher.
Check out dp-watchfaces.com

---
